title: Bronze is a joke
body:
And until Matchmaking gets fixed it will always remain that way, it's borderline retarded what happens in that queue.

2 games ago I was 0/2 top lane, enemy Graves was 0/6 bot lane... 5 minutes in. By the time I was 2/5, with the second best score on my team, Graves was 14/0. Our Vayne not once the whole game was doing any noticeable damage, her AA simply done nothing and the only time she really done anything was when she ulted and got her 3 hit combo, even than it was pitiful.

Next game I go 14/7 as Annie, all lanes had very similar matchups, 2 tanky AP top, 2 squishy burst damage AP mid and 2 tanky AD jungles with some CC. By mid game, every time Ahri attacked me I would QWR her and kill her, Tibbers was on a 46 second CDR and active for 45 seconds, enough time to kill Ahri, wait for her to spawn and be ready with another R to kill her with. It got to the point we were going 0v5 and winning, I had Tibbers scaring away 5 of them, just Tibbers, no minions, no players, just one bear.

The games are so one sided that it makes you wonder what Rito are doing with MM, or is it just that there are too many new players coming into ranked that the cesspool of shit in Bronze is just too much for MM to handle?

2 games ago the enemy Graves was clearly outside of where he belongs, otherwise the Vayne was clearly out of her league. Last game I was either against a useless mid, or came across 9 other players who, due to how MM is, were lower skilled than me, yet same MMR. I didn't even feel like I was trying in that game it was so easy.

replies.body: I stopped reading when I saw graves went from 0/6 to 14/0

Just learn to play easy champions that are strong. If you are stuck in bronze then 99% of the time it is  on you to improve. Bronze is Bronze. Also from what I have seen about your other posts you just like to complain on the boards.

My experience is that bronze is the most inaccurate elo of all of them.

I can easily hold my own in low silver, despite my b5 rank,  and i regularly carry games with wildly off meta builds like say my personal favourite kindred tank adc (why tank? because supports who know how to peel dont exist in bronze so i needed something that can 1v2 while i drag my xp leaching potato down the lane)

There is just too many anomalies in bronze for it to actually be an accurate representation of skill level.

Is there even a meta in bronze like a friend of mine went AD Nami JG and stole dragon with the summoner spells of cleanse and clairvoyance (This was a while ago though because it was when we had that awesome spell called clairvoyance which showed like 1 whole section of a jungle with a 1 min cd)

The only easy answer i  can give you to that is yes there is a meta.

But most of the elo is so mentally handicapped that you can get away with off meta picks without even trying.

ive won a game playing as zac without buying a single item as an example.

I Also carried a trynd game with the same thing, didnt buy any items till i had 10k gold 30 minutes in then proceeded to push to nexus in a matter of minutes.

Granted i am out of my true mmr, im a tilter by habit so im kind of stuck down here until i either A get so good at the game that i can still carry while tilted, or learn to stop tilting.
Get out of bronze if you think its so much of a joke. If your teammates are the ones dragging you down then go make a remade team. EZ solution
